summary: Call forth Sheogorath to help you out for a day!
descriptionHtml:
Call forth Sheogorath to help you out for a day!

This is an Expert Conjuration Spell which calls forth Sheogorath(or does it?). He has a Wabbajack and the Mace of Molag Bal, but can also pick up random weapons 
on the battlefield. A Spell Tome is included, but I\'m not telling you where it\'s located. 
The only hint I\'ll give you is that it\'s in the Pelagius Wing, in the Blue Palace.

However, if you don\'t feel like searching for it, you can do Sheogorath\'s quest, he\'ll give you this tome as a reward along with the Wabbajack.

I\'ll be updating this mod with more features on the near future, maybe even add a quest of it\'s own.

This is my first mod, and I really liked how it turned out.
Subscribe to keep track of my upcoming mods, thanks!
author: EdgyBluz
